info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield and central New Haven Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodbridge, or near Shelton, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Haven, Meriden, Milford, Wallingford, Shelton, Naugatuck, Guilford, Southbury, Newtown, Hamden, Cheshire, Branford, North Haven, Monroe and Seymour. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
